title: So, what do you do as a Twitch when
body:
1. The enemy support is a godhand blitzcrank who pulls from between the minions. I couldn't even CS, I had to back immediately.
2. You get camped literally all game by everyone.
3. Your support never warding.
4. Practically no help from your own team, and the one time you do get a gank, it's counterganked immediately.
5. By camped, I mean I couldn't leave the turret without a 10/2 Lulu and Ezreal coming from red buff bush, dropping a pink, and destroying me. Followed by an AD Jarvan ult directly under tower in the next 20 seconds.

My god, it was such a stressful game.
